title: Coin Control
description: Coin control allows users to choose which coins are to be spent as inputs in an outgoing transaction. It gives you total control over what information you choose to reveal each time you use Bitcoin.

links.title: Bitcoinâ€™s UTXO Model
links.description: UTXO (Unspent Transaction Output) consolidation is a management technique where multiple UTXOs are combined into a single UTXO.

links.title: Labelbase
links.description: All-in-one coin control/label management service for Bitcoin. Add, import, export labels. REST API for integration. Supports BIP-329 format.
